references.paper_title: Adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This work is crucial to the current paper as it provides the underlying method for adding conditional control to diffusion models, a core component of DiffuMural.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This work is likely important because it describes latent diffusion models, which are used in the current paper for high-resolution image synthesis of murals.
This work is important to the study as it explores the use of transformers in diffusion models to improve scalability, which enables better mural restoration.

references.paper_title: RePaint: Inpainting using denoising diffusion probabilistic models
references.reason: This work likely serves as a comparative baseline to the proposed DiffuMural model, as it uses denoising diffusion probabilistic models for inpainting, a closely related task.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This work provides a style-based generator which is used in other mural restoration papers mentioned in the document.
